title: Ticket #873: Test for packaging regressions
description:
We need some sort of automated test that ensures that our packages are sensible.

For UNIX, this means at least: (1) are binary packages complete (with all and only necessary additional scripts/hooks/etc)? and (2) can one unpack this tarball and do something useful with it?

For Windows, it means at least: (1) does the msi create properly? is it, as above, "complete?" (2) does the msi install properly, setting registry keys and configuration options as appropriate? and (3) does the condor service actually start after the msi is installed?
